top_comments.comment: It’s just beyond frustrating,aren’t they really interested in holding anyone accountable for these heinous crimes against the American people??!! My God, if it was me I’d have been thrown in jail and threw away the keys!! It’s like this AG doesn’t want to do anything like he’s scared or something, well if that’s the case, then just quit and give YOU the job, I’m sure you’ll do what’s needed!! Jesus Christ man, these people are killing me with this procrastination shit!!!!!

How did it go in Virginia with all this living in the past and waiting for a stale, pale, male to do the right thing in the DOJ? 

America - you have the representation you deserve. I'm enjoying watching the sun set on the arrogance and ignorance of the US.

comments_since_last_sample.body: What an amazing ineffective and spineless justice system.  White collar crime, specifically Trump style behaviour, seems to yet again go unpunished.   Why would anyone follow the law?  Banana republic.
How many days has it been now?
